title: NFT Social Drop

detectedZones.meaning: Central deployment and safety-pipeline validation for this app

spatialSummary: The Core Incubation Pod anchors this "NFT Social Drop" deployment. DeFi Yield Zone and Social Discovery Hub extend outward from it. Lifecycle status: SUPPORTED.
evolutionNote: This app signals the agent is honing in on a successful niche — trend alignment led to user traction.
